name: 2D Shooter - Tutorial
description:
Soren Gerlach's 2D shooter part 1 (tutorial)

Potential Modifications:

1. Create a fully-fledged level 2 & 3. Each will have unique designs and enemy spawn points.

2. Ship powerups: a multi-shot powerup (shoot three at once) or a speed boost powerup, or both.

3. Design a new enemy and give it custom movements and firing patterns.

4. Potentially create my own music for the game, I will assess if this will be possible when I try it. It sounds fun though.

Created by Soren Gerlach
